data.name: Haunted Shrine
data.desc: If you control no monsters: Target 1 Zombie monster in your GY; Special Summon it. If you control no monsters: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Zombie monster in your GY; Special Summon it, but its effects are negated. You can only use 1 "Haunted Shrine" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

card_sets.set_name: Speed Duel: Trials of the Kingdom
